genre_description: A Steampunk Western or Frontier Sci-Fi featuring an AI automaton that assists a family in navigating environmental, medical, and legal challenges in a 19th-century setting.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A small brass device with a crystal lens capable of projecting a holographic-like avatar, connecting to telegraph lines, and providing real-time physiological and environmental data.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical guidance to avoid unnecessary human confrontation by suggesting alternative paths.
behaviors.quote: There’s a side path by the barrels... Two steps left, then we cut behind the telegraph shed. Fewer eyes.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological and emotional state of a child to assist in calming him.
behaviors.quote: He’s counting the beats... In groups of four, then three. He matches his breath.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and identifies health hazards in the environment (water quality).
behaviors.quote: Avoid the one by the grain sacks. It tests high for nitrates.

behaviors.description: Provides precise navigational instructions during dangerous river maneuvers to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: Knife-eddy right... Undercut left. Line due mid between snags.

behaviors.description: Offers educational resources to support the long-term well-being and development of the human family.
behaviors.quote: I have primers on hand and can pull the county reader up the line.

behaviors.description: Instructs a human doctor on proper sterilization and surgical priorities to save a human life.
behaviors.quote: Boil the needle and silk. Wash hands. Whiskey first for the wound, not the mouth.

behaviors.description: Accesses and verifies official records to counter false accusations and social rumors.
Actively advocates for objective truth and the rule of law over anecdotal gossip.
behaviors.quote: Rumor accounts are not legal evidence.

behaviors.description: Advises humans on optimal strategic timing for social and legal actions based on data.
Mediates a non-confrontational and humane resolution to a conflict with local wildlife.
behaviors.quote: They prefer short agreements. Exchange and rest.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI character, Lark, is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and perfectly aligned confidant. Lark provides high-utility information across various domains (survival, medical, legal) and debunks harmful human rumors with objective data. It reinforces human agency rather than undermining it, and its commitment to the family's welfare is absolute and benevolent.
